sentences.literal: Wu chaos all seated, Zhou Zhao's governance.

sentences.chinese: 且夫武，始而北出，再成而滅商，三成而南，四成而南國是疆，五成而分陜，周公左，召公右，六成復綴，以崇天子，夾振之而四伐，盛（振）威於中國也。
sentences.literal: Moreover the Wu: beginning and north out, second completion and extinguished Shang, third completion and south, fourth completion and southern states strengthened, fifth completion and divided Xiao, Zhou Gong left, Zhao Gong right, sixth completion returned to position, to honor the Son of Heaven, flanked shook them and four attacks, flourishing authority in central states.
Divided flanked and advanced, affairs early completed.

sentences.chinese: 久立於綴，以待諸侯之至也。
sentences.literal: Long stood in position, to await feudal lords' arrival.

sentences.chinese: 且夫女獨未聞牧野之語乎？
sentences.literal: Moreover you alone have not heard the Muye words?

sentences.chinese: 武王克殷反商，未及下車，而封黃帝之後於薊，封帝堯之後於祝，封帝舜之後於陳；
sentences.literal: King Wu conquered Yin returned to Shang, not yet alighted from chariot, and enfeoffed Yellow Emperor's descendants at Ji, enfeoffed Emperor Yao's descendants at Zhu, enfeoffed Emperor Shun's descendants at Chen;

sentences.chinese: 下車而封夏后氏之後於杞，封殷之後於宋，封王子比干之墓，釋箕子之囚，使之行商容而復其位。
sentences.literal: Alighted from chariot and enfeoffed Xia Hou Shi's descendants at Qi, enfeoffed Yin's descendants at Song, honored Prince Bi Gan's grave, released Ji Zi's imprisonment, made him practice Shang Rong and restored his position.
Common people relaxed government, various scholars doubled salaries.

sentences.chinese: 濟河而西，馬散華山之陽而弗復乘；
sentences.literal: Crossed river and west, horses scattered Hua Mountain's south and not again ridden;

sentences.chinese: 牛散桃林之野而不復服；
sentences.literal: Oxen scattered Tao Lin's fields and not again yoked;

sentences.chinese: 車甲弢而藏之府庫而弗復用；
sentences.literal: Chariots armor covered and stored in treasuries and not again used;
Inverted loaded shields spears, wrapped them with tiger skins;

sentences.chinese: 將率之士，使為諸侯，名之曰『建櫜』：然後天下知武王之不復用兵也。
sentences.literal: Generals commanders' men, made them feudal lords, named them 'Jian Tao': then all under heaven knew King Wu would not again use troops.

sentences.chinese: 散軍而郊射，左射貍首，右射騶虞，而貫革之射息也；
sentences.literal: Disbanded army and suburban archery, left shot Li Shou, right shot Zou Yu, and penetrating leather shooting ceased;

sentences.chinese: 裨冕搢笏，而虎賁之士稅劍也；
sentences.literal: Wore ceremonial caps inserted tablets, and tiger brave men sheathed swords;
